org.apache.ctakes.ytex.kernel

Interface SparseDataFormatter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseSparseDataFormatter, LibSVMFormatterFactory.LibSVMFormatter, SemiLFormatterFactory.SemiLDataFormatter, SGTFormatterFactory.SGTFormatter, SparseMatrixFormatterFactory.SparseMatrixDataFormatter, SVMLightFormatterFactory.SVMLightFormatter, SVMLinFormatterFactory.SVMLinDataFormatter, WekaAttributeEvaluatorImpl.WekaAttributeEvaluatorFormatter, WekaFormatterFactory.WekaFormatter

    public interface SparseDataFormatter
    stateful class called by the sparseDataExporter to export sparse data in a specific format. This is created, called for each fold, training, and test set, then thrown away.
